pkgmetadata.longdescription: 한글 분해/조합/편집 종합 툴킷=========================- 한글 자모 분해, 조합- 문장 분해, 조합(오토마타)- 조사 붙이기- 초/중/종 분해조합- 한글/한자/영문 여부 체크Simple Toolkit for Hangul=========================- charactor compose/decompose to ja-mo- text decomposing & composing(automata)- attach postposition to word- get cho/joong/jong from charactor- check function for is hangul/hanja(chinese used in korean)/latinTested in- python 2.6- python 2.7- python 3.3- python 3.4- python 3.5- python 3.6- python nightly build- PyPy 2.2.5.- Pypy 3 2.4.- PyPy 5.3.1Apache 2.0 License
